title: [Large-scale] Learning Object Design Competency Strengthening Through Reflective Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Instructional Design Concepts and Digital Education Tool Experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based mobile learning environment, focusing on developing language education learning objects

learning_goals: Learners can systematically document learning object design decision-making processes by applying the Reflective Action Instructional Design (RAID) framework
Learners can perform peer and self-assessments using the Learning Object Review Instrument (LORI) and derive improvement strategies
Learners can design VR simulation learning objects for K-12 language education that accommodate diverse learning styles

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
